sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect,useState } from "react"; import config from '../../Config/config'; import time from '../../TimeFunctions' export default function ImageViewer(props) { const data = props.match.params.number; const [imageInfo,setImageInfo] = useState(''); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(""); useEffect(()=>{ axios.post(`${config.backendUrl}imageinfo`,{'_id':data}) .then(res=>setImageInfo(res.data)) },[]) useEffect(() => { const id = localStorage.getItem("email"); axios.post(`${config.backendUrl}userdata`, { email: id }).then((res) => { setUserName(res.data.fname + " " + res.data.lname); }); }, []); return (
{imageInfo.imageName}
{imageInfo.category}
{userName}
{time.convertDate(imageInfo.date)} {time.convertTime(imageInfo.date)}
